commits.message: Fix for mismatch in txn pool data (#3833)

ZIL-5376: Support type 1 and type 2 Ethereum transactions (#3827)

A brief description of how these transaction types differ and
the potentially controversial choices I made while supporting
them...

Type 1 transactions are defined in EIP-2930 and allow access lists
to be provided with transactions. In Zilliqa, access lists are
completely ignored and do not have any affect on gas accounting,
but we do keep track of them so the transaction can be
reconstructed later.

Type 2 transactions are defined in EIP-1559 and accept access
lists, plus they allow for a different model for gas accounting.
Instead of setting a single `gasPrice` for a transaction, you set
a 'priority fee' which is paid in addition to the block's base
fee. A maximum fee is also sent in transactions which limits the
total fee the user is willing to pay (base fee + priority fee).
In Zilliqa, we ignore the priority fee and just use the maximum
fee as the entire fee for the transaction.

Its also worth noting that I removed the ability to
configurability of transaction versions and just hardcoded the
values that we use everywhere. We were already hardcoding these
in many places in the source code, so there was only one set of
configured values which would actually result in a working network
anyway.
(feat) ZIL-5423: Deployment instructions for reward control contracts.
chore: update response stats for debugging
Add logs when txn forwarding happens
Fix for mismatch in txn pool data
Save the changes that have been tested and verified

A brief description of how these transaction types differ and

them...

Type 1 transactions are defined in EIP-2930 and allow access lists
to be provided with transactions. In Zilliqa, access lists are
completely ignored and do not have any affect on gas accounting,
but we do keep track of them so the transaction can be
reconstructed later.

Type 2 transactions are defined in EIP-1559 and accept access
lists, plus they allow for a different model for gas accounting.
Instead of setting a single `gasPrice` for a transaction, you set
a 'priority fee' which is paid in addition to the block's base

total fee the user is willing to pay (base fee + priority fee).
In Zilliqa, we ignore the priority fee and just use the maximum
fee as the entire fee for the transaction.

Its also worth noting that I removed the ability to
configurability of transaction versions and just hardcoded the
values that we use everywhere. We were already hardcoding these
in many places in the source code, so there was only one set of
configured values which would actually result in a working network
anyway.
Refactor Lookup by using common code.
Improve logging and refactor to use common code.
Add missing conditions for otterscan database.
Make the bucket name in localdev.py configurable.

release.name: v9.3.0rc0
release.body:
## What's Changed
* [master] Probe erc165 interface by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3643
* [master] Charge gas for failed transaction by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3659
* [master] Add RFC 75 tests by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3657
* [master] Prepare structure for rfc75 tests by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3660
* [master] Fixing tests by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3664
* [master] ZIL-5264: Increase gas cost when mod is even by @JamesHinshelwood in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3668
* [master] Adding scilla call tests per rfc by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3669
* [master] Add the scilla contract we previously could not parse. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3667
* [master] ZIL-5280: Various localdev fixes by @rrw-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3671
* Scilla call tests by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3673
* [master] Update scilla image version in dockerfile by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3674
* [master] API enable otterscan extended tracing by @n-hutton in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3676
* [master] (fix) ZIL-5283: Define SCILLA_REPO_ROOT when building locally by @rrw-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3680
* [master] Unified gas tracking by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3679
* [master] ZIL-5288: Add a --native option to build-scilla to allow building it natively. by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3687
* [master] Zil 5287 isolated server scilla fix by @rrw-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3688
* Mirror evm ds by @n-hutton in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3684
* [master] Adding revert test cases by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3689
* [master] make spurious otter messages go away by @n-hutton in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3690
* [master] ScillaCall2 does not return value by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3694
* Add init tests script. [skip ci] by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3692
* Update the scilla cache [skip ci] by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3699
* [master] Adding gas verification test by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3698
* [master] ZIL-5298: add connection timer and make reconnection time configurable by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3696
* [master] ZIL-5302: Fix `contractAddress` calculation for non-Eth transactions by @JamesHinshelwood in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3703
* [master] Add transfer task. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3705
* [master] Preserve msg_fallback_handler in the chain of scilla calls by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3706
* [master] Wait for transaction receipt in transfer task by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3707
* [master] Cleanup of fixes for chainlink by @n-hutton in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3695
* [master] Fix a tiny bug in transfer task by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3709
* [master] Zil 5301 localdev setup by @rrw-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3701
* [master] Fixed firstPage and lastPage assignment by @lucac-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3715
* [master] Missing cherry picks from v9.2 by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3713
* [master] Remove Tilt. by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3716
* [master] Fix issues ZIL-5305 to ZIL-5307 by @lucac-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3717
* [master] ZIL-5214: Revert priority mutex implementation for AccountStore by @chetan-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3686
* [master] fix incorrect setting of otter parameter by @n-hutton in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3720
* [master] Added check for correct files in home directory by @lucac-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3721
* [master] (fix) ZIL-5315: Fix license headers on setup scripts and license_checker.sh error message. by @rrw-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3726
* [master] Zil 5313 estimategas block or tag by @rrw-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3728
* [master] Added transactionCount field to fullblock object by @lucac-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3730
* [master] Fixed function so correctly returns GasLimit by @lucac-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3731
* [master] Display the amount of zils used to run tests by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3738
* [master] Add test parallelism infrastructure by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3734
* [master] Fix codehash feature to retrieve only contract code hash by @chetan-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3744
* [master] Support grep in running tests in parallel mode. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3746
* [master] Support running tests in user-specified files in parallel mode. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3749
* [master] Support nested describes in parallel mode. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3750
* [master] Make tests parallel-friendly by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3751
* [master] Speed up init signers script. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3754
* [master] Fix time display in output results. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3757
* [master] Enable gas estimation tests by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3700
* [master] Fix nonce from `eth_getBlockBy{Hash,Number}` by @JamesHinshelwood in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3756
* [master] Update tests config. Remove useless networks. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3761
* [master] Fixing wrong log/receipt formats by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3767
* [master] ZIL-5326: remove dependency on Python3 & boost::filesystem by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3770
* [master] Fixed vcpkg binary cache URL. by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3771
* [master] ZIL-5355: upgrade to OpenSSL 3 by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3772
* [master] Support integer block numbers in eth APIs. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3778
* [master] US-272: build tool compatibility by @rrw-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3769
* [master] Temporarily revert ZIL-5355 by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3781
* [master] feat: add push dev image to GCP by @frankmeds in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3782
* [master] feat: improve dev pipeline readability by @frankmeds in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3783
* [master] Relax restriction on nodejs version for acceptance tests. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3784
* [master] feat: add prd image push on GCP by @frankmeds in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3790
* [master] Merge q4-working-branch to master by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3780
* [master] Add tests for GetBalance method of zilliqa API. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3791
* [master] ZIL-5298: adapt fix to changes in P2P. by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3792
* [master] Add a new mocha reporter to improve test report readability. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3793
* [master] Changing rewards in desharded mode by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3794
* [master] GetTransactionStatus Should respect txn query with or without 0x. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3795
* [master] Make scilla tests parallel-friendly. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3762
* [master] Restart scilla process at vacuous epoch (#3758) by @chetan-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3796
* [master] ZIL-5393: update the default tracing & logging OTel settings in the configuration. by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3798
* [master] (fix) ZIL-5402 Ignore errors if values that may not exist in config.x… by @rrw-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3801
* [master] Kill evm and scilla client by PID not by name. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3797
* [master] Add logs count in transaction receipt tests. (#5352) by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3803
* [master] (fix) ZIL-5407 Specifying --isolated-server-accounts in localdev shou… by @rrw-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3807
* [master] Re-enable all the tests and have them pass. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3804
* [master] feat: publish images in GCP in public registry prd by @frankmeds in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3813
* [master] Debug/master pow ds submission by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3812
* [master] ZIL-5384: On-chain reward control by @rrw-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3806
* [master] Remove --skip-non-guard-ds config for desharded mode by @chetan-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3811
* [master] Change localdev config by @chetan-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3814
* [master] Add template.ts script to tests. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3820
* [master] ZIL-5420: use environment variables for MongoDB host port & db name. by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3819
* [master] ZIL-5418: add reward scaling by @rrw-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3817
* [master] ZIL-5354 sendTransaction doesn't work - response handled differently in ethers 6, looking for 0x0 in data not empty string. by @Steve-White-UK in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3822
* [master] ZIL-5420: add a REMOTESTORAGE_DB_CONN_STRING by @yaron-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3824
* [master] Allow insertion of txn to db at lookup node by @chetan-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3825
* [master] Remove frequent logs by @chetan-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3821
* [master] Remove husky package from acceptance tests. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3828
* [master] add --desk fkag to localdev up command by @Steve-White-UK in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3831
* [master] Fix and enable gas transfer tests. by @its-saeed in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3829
* [master] Zil 5413 by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3832
* [master] BugFix ZIL-5424 : Fix for mismatch in txn pool data by @chetan-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3833
* [master] (fix) ZIL-5438: Revert NUM_FINAL_BLOCKS_PER_POW settings. by @rrw-zilliqa in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3834
* [master] ZIL-5376: Support type 1 and type 2 Ethereum transactions by @JamesHinshelwood in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3827
* [master] Fixing cosig retrievals by @bzawisto in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3835

## New Contributors
* @lucac-zilliqa made their first contribution in https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/pull/3715

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Zilliqa/Zilliqa/compare/v9.2.6...v9.3.0rc0

commits.message:
ZIL-5376: Support type 1 and type 2 Ethereum transactions (#3827)

A brief description of how these transaction types differ and
the potentially controversial choices I made while supporting
them...

Type 1 transactions are defined in EIP-2930 and allow access lists
to be provided with transactions. In Zilliqa, access lists are
completely ignored and do not have any affect on gas accounting,
but we do keep track of them so the transaction can be
reconstructed later.

Type 2 transactions are defined in EIP-1559 and accept access
lists, plus they allow for a different model for gas accounting.
Instead of setting a single `gasPrice` for a transaction, you set
a 'priority fee' which is paid in addition to the block's base
fee. A maximum fee is also sent in transactions which limits the
total fee the user is willing to pay (base fee + priority fee).
In Zilliqa, we ignore the priority fee and just use the maximum
fee as the entire fee for the transaction.

Its also worth noting that I removed the ability to
configurability of transaction versions and just hardcoded the
values that we use everywhere. We were already hardcoding these
in many places in the source code, so there was only one set of
configured values which would actually result in a working network
anyway.

A brief description of how these transaction types differ and the potentially controversial choices I made while supporting them...

Type 1 transactions are defined in EIP-2930 and allow access lists to be provided with transactions. In Zilliqa, access lists are completely ignored and do not have any affect on gas accounting, but we do keep track of them so the transaction can be reconstructed later.

Type 2 transactions are defined in EIP-1559 and accept access lists, plus they allow for a different model for gas accounting. Instead of setting a single `gasPrice` for a transaction, you set a 'priority fee' which is paid in addition to the block's base fee. A maximum fee is also sent in transactions which limits the total fee the user is willing to pay (base fee + priority fee). In Zilliqa, we ignore the priority fee and just use the maximum fee as the entire fee for the transaction.

Its also worth noting that I removed the ability to configurability of transaction versions and just hardcoded the values that we use everywhere. We were already hardcoding these in many places in the source code, so there was only one set of configured values which would actually result in a working network anyway.

comment.body:
The old code invoked the conversion operator() explicitly, so to make it equivalent I suggested you check that this change does the same instead of invoking the constructor and then copying or converting.
If you're saying that this is doing what it's supposed to do then I'd say it's fine.

pull_request.title: [master] ZIL-5376: Support type 1 and type 2 Ethereum transactions
pull_request.body:
A brief description of how these transaction types differ and the potentially controversial choices I made while supporting them...

Type 1 transactions are defined in EIP-2930 and allow access lists to be provided with transactions. In Zilliqa, access lists are completely ignored and do not have any affect on gas accounting, but we do keep track of them so the transaction can be reconstructed later.

Type 2 transactions are defined in EIP-1559 and accept access lists, plus they allow for a different model for gas accounting. Instead of setting a single `gasPrice` for a transaction, you set a 'priority fee' which is paid in addition to the block's base fee. A maximum fee is also sent in transactions which limits the total fee the user is willing to pay (base fee + priority fee). In Zilliqa, we ignore the priority fee and just use the maximum fee as the entire fee for the transaction.

Its also worth noting that I removed the ability to configurability of transaction versions and just hardcoded the values that we use everywhere. We were already hardcoding these in many places in the source code, so there was only one set of configured values which would actually result in a working network anyway.

repo.name: Zilliqa
repo.description: Zilliqa is the world's first high-throughput public blockchain platform - designed to scale to thousands ​of transactions per second.

comment.body:
Sorry, I don't understand what you mean by "confirm that this will indeed invoke the operator()"? (I'm probably missing some C++ knowledge here)

It is definitely reading the RLP bytes and converting them to a  `zbytes` though, because the tests still parse. If that wasn't happening we would get signature verification failures.

pull_request.title: [master] (fix) ZIL-5438: Revert NUM_FINAL_BLOCKS_PER_POW settings.
pull_request.body:
## Description

Revert the number of blocks per PoW back to what it always used to be.

## Backward Compatibility
<!-- For breaking changes, code must be protected by UPGRADE_TARGET -->
- [X] This is not a breaking change
- [ ] This is a breaking change

## Review Suggestion
<!-- How should the reviewers get started on reviewing your pull request-->
<!-- How can the reviewers verify the pull request is working as expected -->

## Status

### Implementation
<!-- Add more TODOs before "ready for review", if any  -->
- [ ] **ready for review**

### Integration Test (Core Team)
<!-- This is for core team only, ignore this if you are a community contributor -->
Try a localdev network and observe that it does a committee change once every 50 blocks rather than once every 5.

<!-- append the commit digest to inform the others of the versions you have tested -->
- [ ] local machine test
<!-- - [ ] local machine test (commit: bbbbbbbb) -->
<!-- - [ ] local machine test (commit: cccccccc) -->
<!-- - [ ] local machine test (commit: dddddddd) -->
- [ ] small-scale cloud test
<!-- - [ ] small-scale cloud test (commit: bbbbbbbb) -->
<!-- - [ ] small-scale cloud test (commit: cccccccc) -->
<!-- - [ ] small-scale cloud test (commit: dddddddd) -->
